bug.author: ghchinoy
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/autograph/to_code>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/autograph/to_code</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
Initial description could be clearer, instead of referring to another function as similar (to_graph), restate primary use case:
From: “Similar to to_graph, but returns Python source code as a string.” To: “to_code is a low-level API that returns the AutoGraph generated Python source code as a string. This is similar to to_graph, which returns the TensorFlow graph, instead of Python.”
<denchmark-h:h3>Usage example</denchmark-h>
No usage example in docs, only references to guides/example, would suggest uplifting an example from a guide to the docs for completeness (ref <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/alpha/guide/autograph>https://www.tensorflow.org/alpha/guide/autograph</denchmark-link> ) <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Yes

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ghchinoy>@ghchinoy</denchmark-link> I notice you raise a PR to resolve this issue. Unfortunately that was not against so the PR was closed. Can you submit that PR against . Thanks!

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ghchinoy>@ghchinoy</denchmark-link> Can you submit this PR against ? You can copy and paste the closed PR and open it against that will be helpful to the community. Thanks!
Closing due to lack of recent activity. Please update the issue when new information becomes available, and we will reopen the issue. Thanks!
